[scenario]
clients=client10026;client10027
import=body.txt
actions=end-of-message-change-header

[client10026]
port=10026
arguments=--change-header;X-Test-Header1:2:Test Header1 Value

[client10027]
port=10027
arguments=--change-header;X-Test-Header2:1:Test Header2 Value

[end-of-message-change-header]
command=end-of-message

response=end-of-message
n_received=2
status=continue

change_headers=2:X-Test-Header1:Test Header1 Value;1:X-Test-Header2:Test Header2 Value
